version_description:
FOOTBALL IS BACK LIKE NEVER BEFORE!

Did the return of football this season give you goosebumps? Well, you're going to get even more with this new version of Fantasy Manager Football 2016. We've prepared a new version, totally different from the other manager games. You'll be able to continue playing with your current roster and enjoy the following main updates we've included for you:

PLAYER LOANS: The biggest update of the new version. Connect with Facebook and borrow players from your friends. You can use them in decisive matches and even win thanks to them. Furthermore, every time you use that player, both you and your friend will receive a prize.

NEW NAVIGATION MENU: We've made changes to the navigation menu so you can enter to sign players, either through the auction or direct purchase. You decide.

NO MORE TRAINING. Tired of training your players after every match? Well, in this new version, you won't have to! This means that all your players will remain at 100%!

NEW HEAD COACH: Your technical team will grow this season which will allow you to lead your players to an incredible level.

NEW STORE: We've made changes to the store to improve the usability so that it can be much easier to find everything that's available to you. Oh, and we're going to tell you a little secret... in the coming versions we're going to be adding even more improvements.

NEW DESIGN: We've redesigned the HOME screen, as well as the league banner, in order to improve visibility and include more options.

NEW TRANSFERS: We've updated the rosters of all our official teams. We'll have more news soon.
As you can see, we've worked very hard to make the game more fun for football fans. Thanks to your suggestions, we're constantly improving the game. We're already working to improve our future versions as well.

For another year of great football, download the new version... NOW!
Stability improvements and bug fixes.
Stability improvements and bug fixes.

Greetings managers,

The feature you have all been waiting for is here!

*************
You can now buy and sell players to other managers!
*************

SELL YOUR PLAYERS
Choose the price you want for your player and put him on the market. The other managers can sign the players from the new “Market” section.

BUY PLAYERS FROM OTHER MANAGERS
Stay tuned to the market to see which players are on sale. Find the player you want, offer him a good deal and the player will sign for your team.

Furthermore, to enrich this amazing feature we have also added the “extra slot” item for additional players in the shop. You will be able to have up to 60 players on your roster!

Start making offers and don’t let the other managers sign all the star players!
Bug fixes and stability improvements

PUT YOUR FOOTBALL PREDICTIONS TO TEST

Do you think you know more than the other managers about football?

Well this version is for you because, starting today, you'll be able to show just how much you know in the new DAILY CONTESTS. Choose which players from your team that you want to represent you in these new competitions and you could win hundreds of coins! Don't forget to keep signing up because the more players you have, the more chances you have of winning.

We've also designed a new store that will make everything much easier for you.

So yes, the moment to show that you're the best manager has come!

Download this new version now!

THE MOST INTERNATIONAL VERSION OF FANTASY MANAGER HAS ARRIVED

Get ready and have fun in this new and unique summer version created specially for the competition of the most important national teams in Europe and America. We've personalized the game for this special occasion and you'll have the chance to immerse yourself in the emotion of the competition in which only the best players in the world are playing.

In addition, you'll be able to get exclusive players throughout this period of time.

This is your chance to have the time of your life. Download the new version now!

CONTINUE PLAYING THE MOST INTERNATIONAL VERSION OF FANTASY MANAGER!

Get ready and keep playing in this summer version created specially for the competition of the most important national teams in Europe and America. We continue offering personalized national teams for this special occasion and you'll have the chance to immerse yourself in the emotion of the competition in which only the best players in the world are playing.

In addition, you'll be able to get exclusive players throughout this period of time.

This is your chance to have the time of your life. Download the new version now!

ARE YOU READY FOR A NEW STRATOSPHERIC SEASON IN FANTASY MANAGER?

As soon as you update the version, you'll see that this season we've made some updates that are out of this world: new players, new teams, new graphics, improvements, etc. Above all, you'll see a radical change in your progression as a manager. If you've been playing for a long time, or you're the champion or runner-up in first division, you'll get the push that you've been waiting for, with league opponents only pertaining to your division and more powerful players that can help improve your Team Value significantly!

Don't wait any longer and feel the excitment of football like never before in this new version that takes you to a whole new dimension. Download the new version now!

THE REF HAS BLOWN THE WHISTLE. LET THE NEW SEASON BEGIN!

We're ready to kick off one more season in all stadiums and, of course, in Fantasy Manager! It's going to be a year full of new signings, revelation players, exciting international competitions and managers enjoying Fantasy Manager!

Update to the new version now!

THANKS FOR YOUR SUGGESTIONS

We continue to improve thanks to your comments. We've added a new way of signing players from a new planet, and they won't use up a new slot on your team. In fact, they'll make the players you had before even better.

To take advantage of this and more, you'll just have to update the app!

SPY ON YOUR OPPONENT BEFORE CHALLENGING THEM

Do you want to know more about your opponent, or who is the favourite of the match? Well now you can thanks to the new "Spy on opponent" feature that we've added into the game. Use it at the right time and get your team ready. But remember, your opponent can do the same thing to you!

In addition we've added some new screens to inform you about the league results, as well as some other user experience improvements.

Download this new and exciting version now!
Bug fixes.

YOUR TACTICS WILL BE DECISIVE IN YOUR LEAGUE MATCHES

We've added a new feature in the game: Tactics! It's a great new way for you to show your coaching skills.

Think about whether you want to play counterattack, with advanced or very intense defense, because everything matters when the time comes to stop your opponent. If you play your cards right, it'll show significantly in the results.

Don't think any longer and download this new and tactical version of Fantasy Manager now!

YOUR TACTICS WILL BE DECISIVE IN YOUR LEAGUE MATCHES

We've added a new feature in the game: Tactics! It's a great new way for you to show your coaching skills.

Think about whether you want to play counterattack, with advanced or very intense defense, because everything matters when the time comes to stop your opponent. If you play your cards right, it'll show significantly in the results.

Don't think any longer and download this new and tactical version of Fantasy Manager now!

PREPARE EACH LEAGUE MATCH AND EXPERIENCE IT LIVE

The league is back, and it's more exciting than ever in this new version. Experience your matches live and watch the play by play to see exactly what's happening on the pitch.

The moment to prepare your match has come. Select the perfect strategy and surprise your opponent when they're least expecting it. Throuhgout the match you'll be able to see the statistics, the lineups, etc. At the end, you'll be able to check out the summary and even the best plays. Everything has been prepared so that you can bring out the manager you've got within you.

Enjoy the evolution of this great version. Download it now!

PREPARE EACH LEAGUE MATCH AND EXPERIENCE IT LIVE

The league is back, and it's more exciting than ever in this new version. Experience your matches live and watch the play by play to see exactly what's happening on the pitch.

The moment to prepare your match has come. Select the perfect strategy and surprise your opponent when they're least expecting it. Throuhgout the match you'll be able to see the statistics, the lineups, etc. At the end, you'll be able to check out the summary and even the best plays. Everything has been prepared so that you can bring out the manager you've got within you.

Enjoy the evolution of this great version. Download it now!

- Bug Fixes!

Enjoy this enhanced version of the game and let us know how we can improve it!

WE'VE IMPROVED THE LIVE MATCH EXPERIENCE

Thanks to your comments, we've improved the live match experience; both the narration and the summary tab that lets you know, on the Home screen, when the match has begun.

Are you anxious to see the changes? Download the new version now and check 'em out!

- Bug Fixes!

Enjoy this enhanced version of the game and let us know how we can improve it!

ARE YOU READY FOR THE WORLD CUP?

In this version, you'll have to fight to qualify for the World Cup planet, so don't wait any longer! Play, qualify and enjoy the many surprises you'll see throughout the World Cup.

Download this new version and get ready for what's about to arrive.

- Bug Fixes!

Enjoy this enhanced version of the game and let us know how we can improve it!

THE RANKING AND THE ULTIMATE PLANET HAVE ARRIVED

The league is back and we want to celebrate it with 2 great news:
RANKING: All the actions you do in the game will be reflected in points for the Ranking. And the more points you get, the better reward you'll get at the end of the month.
CHAMPIONS PLANET: For the most advanced users we open the ultimate planet. A different planet where you will enjoy more managerial options than ever before.

Are you ready for the fun?
In addition, this new version is fully compatible with iPhone X!
Download it now!
